originalText.text: I ordered General Tso's Chicken. It was not good. I've never not devoured this dish in all my life. If I'm being honest, it tasted as though they ran out of the proper sauce and used a substitute or hot sauce. I couldn't finish it.

text.text: I ordered General Tso's Chicken. It was not good. I've never not devoured this dish in all my life. If I'm being honest, it tasted as though they ran out of the proper sauce and used a substitute or hot sauce. I couldn't finish it.

originalText.text:
If you are looking for quality Americanized Chinese food in the neighborhood, this is the place!

When my husband and I ordered from here for the first time, we were so impressed! The ingredients look and taste fresh. Their fried rice has a hint of smoky flavor, the rice is not mushy or hard and every grain is perfected coated with oil. All of their meat is cooked to perfection, their jumbo shrimps plump and juicy and their chicken tender and not dry.

We highly recommend their Shrimp with Lobster Sauce and House Fried Rice (but any of their fried rice).

The only subpar experience we’ve had here was when we ordered their sesame chicken. We ordered over the phone and picked it up, but it was soggy when we got to it. Other than that, they consistently deliver quality food with good service! Oh and this place takes credit card, which in my mind is a nice bonus.

originalText.text: I had shrimp and black bean sauce the 1st time it was great but the 2nd time it was terrible greasy rice no shrimp in my rice my husband chicken wings with shrimp fried rice was awful chicken was hard we will never get anything else from them

originalText.text: I have been dealing with red dragon for years last two experiences were horrible ( I don’t know what’s going on ) food wus greasy cold and over two hours from when I actually ordered it I still gave them another chance and I sent my son downstairs to pick up the order witch wus 38.99 the dilivered driver helped hisself to a 11 dollar tip when my son came back with the order change I counted it and called the restaurant till this day they still have yet to cal me back to resolve the issue or refund me the money my advice to avoid a bad experience chose somewhere else to eat from

originalText.text: I ordered Chicken wings and French Fries and I asked for the fries to be crispy  and the fries came really soft as if it weren't even fried at all but I notice that most Chinese restaurants do that. Was up with that .. the fries never have a golden brown to it with a nice crisp. Like, are Chinese people that cheap that they can't afford quality french fries wow.. that's why most of the time you have to drown it with sauce,and another thing , why are the chicken wings always so tasteless and so very small. I'm sorry but ya'll Chinese people are so smart that yall could invent things but serve people garbage, no quality what's so ever in the food y'all sell...I'm just tired of it now...i wont be eating chinese no more...I'm done...they also always rush the food and it also tasted rushed... smh
